price: (87) And if you asked them[1454] who created them, they would surely say, "Allāh." So how are they deluded?
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤۡفَكُونَ
footnotes: [1454]- Those who associate others with Allāh.
